channel.title: UK Royal Mail?
channel.description:
Hi what is up with the royal mail in United Kingdom, I bought some of them battery packs that go in the back of a xbox360 controller from ebay and it has been like 11 days since i paid. I mean, Like it shouldn't take that long should it? I've been in contact with the seller and he said he dispatched the item the day after i paid for it.
Any advice would be appreciated.

item.title: UK Royal Mail?
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

i brought it from a shop with 98.9% positive feedback and had sold like 30’000 items so i assumed it would be good

Read full topic

item.title: UK Royal Mail?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

rip4d:

Ebay is generally very reliable for shipping. Anything I order from there gets to my house on the first day of estimated delivery.

All depends who you’re buying from though really.

Read full topic

item.title: UK Royal Mail?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

The only thing Ive mailed for has been my RAM.

I bought it from tiger direct, it said 5-7 days and I got it in 4 days.

Read full topic

item.title: UK Royal Mail?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:4, topic:354485”]The mail service is bad in every country.

I just shipped something to the USA with canada post. I paid for tracking and 3-5 day delivery guarenteed. It has been 5 business days and so far it has only made it 3 hours away, in the opposite direction! There has been no tacking available until today. It’s unacceptable because I paid 14 dollars for this, when I could have bought a $1.00 stamp instead.[/quote]
Generally this is selective in area’s within the United States. I can do the 3-5 day to my mother who is in Mississippi, and it will take 6-7. When done via my Mom to me, in Michigan, it will take 3-4 days.

Read full topic

item.title: UK Royal Mail?
item.dc:creator: @kingspiker kingspiker
item.description:
@kingspiker wrote:

not every country has bad mail because i order PC parts all the time and i do overnight shiping and i never have any problems. exp some times the shit is broken…fucking ups assholes… lol got 3 hard drives and they all been broken

Read full topic

item.title: UK Royal Mail?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

The mail service is bad in every country.

I just shipped something to the USA with canada post. I paid for tracking and 3-5 day delivery guarenteed. It has been 5 business days and so far it has only made it 3 hours away, in the opposite direction! There has been no tacking available until today. It’s unacceptable because I paid 14 dollars for this, when I could have bought a $1.00 stamp instead.

Read full topic

@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Ohh… Well theres £11.99 wasted

Read full topic

item.title: UK Royal Mail?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

The Royal Mail is the most unreliable piece of shit known to man. They strike like every week and you constantly hear stories about mail going missing. I would not be suprised at all if your battery packs are lost somewhere on the M1 or some ally nearby their main sorting office in Islington, London.

My advice for next time is to pay a little extra for fedex or ups. As for this time - you’re pretty screwed!

Read full topic
